entries.title: Central Bank's Policy in the Area of Consumer Protection - CBCG
entries.text: The CBCG pursues the consumer protection policy by continuously aligning the regulatory framework with relevant EU regulations and undertaking activities.

entries.title: Monetary Policy - CBCG
entries.text: The CBCG pursues monetary policy in a specific foreign exchange regime. The existing foreign exchange regime in Montenegro is dollarisation (euroisation).

entries.title: Guidelines for Portfolio Selection - CBCG
entries.text: The guidelines prescribe the organisation, data, and methodology for conducting portfolio selection, which is the starting point for the entire AQR process.
